about_the_game:
Escape from Dead City is a fresh, exciting indie beat 'em up project inspired by the best games in the genre.

In Escape from Dead City, you will face hordes of zombies and various mutants to save your loved ones from a failed, catastrophic experiment. Use all your combat skills and whatever items you can find to defeat all enemies and survive...

GAME FEATURES

  • A fresh take on the classic beat 'em up genre from the 1990s

  • Multiplayer mode for up to 4 players simultaneously on one PC

  • A wide variety of combo attacks and ultimate abilities for each character

  • 5 playable characters, each with a unique fighting style and set of attributes

  • 15 different enemies and 8 bosses that will keep you on your toes

  • Over 20 types of weapons and items to stop your enemies

  • A "Survival" mode for those who want to test their skills against hundreds of waves of mutants

DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF KEY GAME FEATURES

Unique Playable Characters
Each character has 5 different attack combos and 3 ultimate abilities, as well as their own set of attributes (speed, strength, health, technique, and attack range). The game also features special moves like a running attack, a jumping attack, and an attack on enemies from behind. All of this allows you to develop your own tactics and fully unlock the potential of each character.

Variety of Weapons and Items
Use anything you can find: from a hunting rifle to a brick or a trash can. Some items can be used repeatedly, while others are only good for a single throw, but each has a unique effect. Use your weapons wisely! Save your shotgun shells for dealing with crowds of mutants.

Survival Mode
Test your skills in Survival mode, fighting waves of mutants in a confined space. There are over 100 waves, each presenting its own dangers, with various mutants and bosses waiting for you.

How long will you last?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 | AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 | AMD Radeon HD 6670
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a dark, post-apocalyptic world, where hordes of unusual zombies and fearsome mutants with unique combat abilities await at every turn. You’ll have to fight through waves of enemies, using all your skills and reflexes to survive and escape this dangerous city!
